snippet: Pep Boys disclosed in a regulatory filing that its would-be buyer, the Gores Group, was potentially seeking to walk away from the $1 billion leveraged buyout of the auto parts and repair company.
abstract: Pep Boys disclosed in a regulatory filing that its would-be buyer, the Gores Group, was potentially seeking to walk away from the $1 billion leveraged buyout of the auto parts and repair company.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Fight Brewing at Pep Boys as Gores Calls L.B.O. Into Question
